Description of incident: Ubiquiti Networks Inc. announced that cyber thieves stole $46.7 million using a scam " in which crooks spoof communications from executives at the victim firm in a bid to initiate unauthorized international wire transfers."Ubiquiti disclosed the attack when they filed a report with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. "The company said it discovered the fraud on June 5, 2015, and that the  incident involved employee impersonation and fraudulent requests from an  outside entity targeting the company’s finance department."More Information: http://krebsonsecurity.com/2015/08/tech-firm-ubiquiti-suffers-46m-cyberh...
